name: Haiyore! Nyaruko-San: Meijoushigatai Game no You na Mono
name_original: Haiyore! Nyaruko-San: Meijoushigatai Game no You na Mono
description:
Haiyore! Nyaruko-San: Meijoushigatai Game no You na Mono is an adventure game developed by 5pb. It was originally released in 2013. 5pb published the game.
You can play Haiyore! Nyaruko-San: Meijoushigatai Game no You na Mono on PS Vita.
